Text: OnePass Offers Earn Bonus MilesUp To Bonus Miles On Our New Nonstop Service From New York To LondonStansted Our new service from New YorkNewark to LondonStansted begins May And from May through July flights to LondonStansted earn you bonus miles each way Thats in addition to the actual miles flown Stansted Airport is convenient for travelers going to central London Canary Wharf and Docklands as well as regional cities like Cambridge So book your tickets today at wwwcontinentalcom Service is subject to government approval Earn OnePassc Bonus Miles With CSFBdirect Were excited to announce another great opportunity to earn major bonus miles with a OnePass partner You will receive OnePass bonus miles when you open a new CSFBdirect account with a minimum deposit or transfer of CSFBdirect is the online investment firm that combines the experience and resources of DLJdirect and Credit Suisse First Boston Let your investments put you that much closer to your next free ticket To learn more about this excellent opportunity visit wwwcsfbdirectcomilikemiles Discount on Camp Inventionc For OnePass Members Continental Airlines the Official Airline of The National Inventors Hall of Fame is pleased to offer Continental OnePass members a special registration rate on NIHFs premier education program Camp Invention This nationally recognized science and creativity day camp for children entering grades takes a unique handson approach to learning OnePass members receive a discount rate of through May simply by providing their OnePass number when registering Check out the camp website at wwwinventorg for camp dates and locations nearest you or call to register for Camp Invention UNFORTUNATELY MAIL SENT TO THIS ADDRESS CANNOT BE ANSWERED PLEASE DIRECT ALL INQUIRIES TO OAIRCOM To modify your OnePass email preferences please login to Your Account at wwwonepasscomyouraccount To unsubscribe from all OnePass email please visit wwwonepasscomemailpartoffers IMAGE
